Input of site data: latitude in decimal degrees (positive in northern hemisphere)
longitude in decimal degrees (negative for western hemisphere)
time zone in hours relative to GMT/UTC (PST= -8, MST= -7, CST= -6, EST= -5)
solar shortwave radiation model for clear sky
coefficient (KCL1) for cloud adjustment of solar radiation
exponent (KCL2) for cloud adjustment of solar radiation
atmospheric longwave radiation model for clear sky
parameter for atmospheric longwave emissivity if using the Brutsaert model equation
model equation for cloud adjustment of downwelling longwave radiation
coefficient (KCL3) for cloud adjustment of downwelling longwave radiation
exponent (KCL4) for cloud adjustment of downwelling longwave radiation
wind speed function for evaporation and air convection/conduction
maximum temperature change during a time step to test for model stability (deg C)
